author: Ailbhe Conneely
title: Nursing homes fear staff shortages after testing blitz
description: Nursing homes are set to face their next Covid-19 hurdle - and it's a big one. Staffing is about to become a greater problem for private and voluntary residential settings nationwide.
content:
Nursing homes are set to face their next Covid-19 hurdle - and it's a big one.
Staffing is about to become a greater problem for private and voluntary residential settings nationwide.
